subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Paulie Malignaggi’s boxing career was in free-fall after a loss to Ricky Hatton in 2008. He switched trainers and started over, and on Saturday will fight at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Paulie Malignaggi’s boxing career was in free-fall after a loss to Ricky Hatton in 2008. He switched trainers and started over, and on Saturday will fight at Madison Square Garden.
